EmailTemplate.name: Solar Install Checklist
EmailTemplate.subject: Update From Palmetto: In Regards to Your Solar Project
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Opportunity.Contact__c},
In order to provide you with clarity on your solar installation project we are providing you with a visual that shows where your project currently is.
Click the link below in order to see the checklist for your solar project.
Please contact Palmetto's Customer Care Team if you have any further questions.
Toll Free: 855-339-1831
Thank You,
Palmetto Customer Care Team customer.care@palmetto.com Toll Free: 855-339-1831 Direct Line: 843-720-1844
